description:
Section 73 application (minor material amendment) to vary condition 7 (approved plans) of planning permission LBI ref 980266 dated 08 September 1998 for the: ‘Erection of two and three storey block comprising four houses and six flats with five parking spaces’.  The minor material amendments are:
A]     Provide 8 marked car parking spaces designated for residents of the development.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The 8 car-parking spaces shown on 'Unlabelled drawing showing proposed parking layout, received by email sent from Katerina Birkeland to Joe Wilson, dated 25/10/11, Timed 15.09.' shall be provided within 1 calender month of the date of this permission and the parking bays shall be appropriately line-marked and thereafter kept available for the parking of vehicles at all times. 

The parking bays shall only be occupied by vehicles connected to the residential use of the site building.  None of the remaining areas of landscaping within the site area as shown on 'Unlabelled drawing showing proposed parking layout, received by email sent from Katerina Birkeland to Joe Wilson, dated 25/10/11, Timed 15.09.' shall be used for parking vehicles.  

The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved and maintained as such thereafter.

REASON:  In the interest of ensuring the appropriate provision of parking in accordance with policies D3, T22, H3, H7 and H10 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002 and policy 7.2 of the London Plan 2011.
